PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2005-04572005-03-24,  HERITAGE,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of FRED S. FOUNTAIN of Head of St. Margaret's Bay, Nova Scotia, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
